snippet.title: myPOPGOES (LAUNCH TRAILER)
snippet.description:
A new Five Nights at Freddy's game has released!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2429350/myPOPGOES/

myPOPGOES is an official Five Nights at Freddy's spinoff game, releasing as the latest entry in the non-canon POPGOES media series for the "10 YEARS" anniversary event! 

In myPOPGOES you play as Bonnie Glade (a central figure in the POPGOES lore) on her 10th birthday, playing with a handmade LCD toy.

Most of myPOPGOES' gameplay is based on a "survival" resource management game housed in the toy, where you try to keep a cute and pixelated Popgoes the Weasel alive by giving him food, entertainment, and Dat Taste (the most refreshing drink in the Candy + Popgoes Universe). This game mode is expanded in the Steam release with special challenge modes and rewards. 

This new version of myPOPGOES also includes five totally different game modes like Fishing and Longest Popgoes, each with their own gameplay styles, though they are all ultimately very simple (and only use three buttons to play!).

myPOPGOES also features a plethora of unlockables and customisation options, like playable characters, stickers, toy skins, character sheets, and diary entries. It's a cute, casual, colourful, fun collection of games.

And it can get a bit creepy too.

Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon
POPGOES by Kane Carter
